Actions.Name: Add user to group
Actions.Description: Add a user to a group in this AAD tenant.

Actions.Name: Assign manager
Actions.Description: Assign a manager for a user.

Actions.Name: Check group membership [DEPRECATED]
Actions.Description:
This action has been deprecated. Please use Check group membership (V2) instead.
If the user is a member of the given group, the result will contain the given id. Otherwise the result will be empty.

Actions.Name: Check group membership (V2)
Actions.Description: If the user is a member of the given group, the result will contain the given id. Otherwise the result will be empty.

Actions.Name: Create group
Actions.Description: Create a group in your AAD tenant.

Actions.Name: Create Office 365 group
Actions.Description: Create an Office 365 group in your AAD tenant.

Actions.Name: Create security group
Actions.Description: Create a security group in your AAD tenant.

Actions.Name: Create user
Actions.Description: Create a new user in your AAD tenant.

Actions.Name: Get group members
Actions.Description: Get the users who are members of a group.

Get the groups a user is a member of.

Actions.Description: Get the groups a user is a member of.

Actions.Name: Refresh tokens
Actions.Description: Invalidate all refresh tokens for a user
